languages.text: "Ну и жизнь..." {n}Джай невесело усмехается.{/n} "Привезли на заштатную планетенку. Бросили на никому не нужные раскопки, о которых, скорее всего, уже и забыть успели. Три из четырех детей мертвы..."

"What a life..." {n}Jae chuckles grimly.{/n} "Dragged to a planet in the middle of nowhere. Dumped on a worthless excavation site that everyone else probably forgot about a long time ago. Three out of four children are dead..."
languages.original_text: "Ну и жизнь..." {n}Джай невесело усмехается.{/n} "Привезли на заштатную планетенку. Бросили на никому не нужные раскопки, о которых, скорее всего, уже и забыть успели. Три из четырех детей мертвы..."

traits.locale_text: "What a life..." {n}Jae chuckles grimly.{/n} "Dragged to a planet in the middle of nowhere. Dumped on a worthless excavation site that everyone else probably forgot about a long time ago. Three out of four children are dead..."

"What a life..." {n}Jae chuckles grimly.{/n} "Dragged to a planet in the middle of nowhere. Dumped on a worthless excavation site that everyone else probably forgot about a long time ago. Three out of four children are dead..."

"What a life..." {n}Jae chuckles grimly.{/n} "Dragged to a planet in the middle of nowhere. Dumped on a worthless excavation site that everyone else probably forgot about a long time ago. Three out of four children are dead..."

"What a life..." {n}Jae chuckles grimly.{/n} "Dragged to a planet in the middle of nowhere. Dumped on a worthless excavation site that everyone else probably forgot about a long time ago. Three out of four children are dead..."

languages.text: 「よく生きてるね…」{n}ジェイは含み笑いを浮かべる。{/n}「何もない場所のど真ん中に連れてこられた。他人には長らく忘れられてるような、価値のない発掘現場に捨てられた。4人中3人の子供は亡くなった…」
languages.original_text: "What a life..." {n}Jae chuckles grimly.{/n} "Dragged to a planet in the middle of nowhere. Dumped on a worthless excavation site that everyone else probably forgot about a long time ago. Three out of four children are dead..."

traits.locale_text: 「よく生きてるね…」{n}ジェイは含み笑いを浮かべる。{/n}「何もない場所のど真ん中に連れてこられた。他人には長らく忘れられてるような、価値のない発掘現場に捨てられた。4人中3人の子供は亡くなった…」

languages.text: “真是像做梦一样的好日子啊……”{n}婕伊冷冷一笑。{/n}“被拖到一颗鸟不生蛋的行星上，丢到毫无价值的挖掘工地，被所有人抛诸脑后，四个孩子也死了三个……”
languages.original_text: "What a life..." {n}Jae chuckles grimly.{/n} "Dragged to a planet in the middle of nowhere. Dumped on a worthless excavation site that everyone else probably forgot about a long time ago. Three out of four children are dead..."

traits.locale_text: “真是像做梦一样的好日子啊……”{n}婕伊冷冷一笑。{/n}“被拖到一颗鸟不生蛋的行星上，丢到毫无价值的挖掘工地，被所有人抛诸脑后，四个孩子也死了三个……”

languages.text: {n}Jae pousse un petit rire sombre.{/n} « Quelle vie... Traînée sur une planète au milieu de nulle part. Abandonnée dans un site de fouilles que tout le monde a sûrement oublié depuis longtemps. Trois enfants morts sur quatre... »
languages.original_text: "What a life..." {n}Jae chuckles grimly.{/n} "Dragged to a planet in the middle of nowhere. Dumped on a worthless excavation site that everyone else probably forgot about a long time ago. Three out of four children are dead..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae pousse un petit rire sombre.{/n} « Quelle vie... Traînée sur une planète au milieu de nulle part. Abandonnée dans un site de fouilles que tout le monde a sûrement oublié depuis longtemps. Trois enfants morts sur quatre... »

languages.text: «Vaya asco de vida...». {n}Jae se ríe siniestramente.{/n} «Arrastrados a un planeta en medio de ninguna parte. Abandonados en un yacimiento sin valor del que todo el mundo se olvidó hace la tira de tiempo. Tres de cada cuatro niños, muertos...».
languages.original_text: "What a life..." {n}Jae chuckles grimly.{/n} "Dragged to a planet in the middle of nowhere. Dumped on a worthless excavation site that everyone else probably forgot about a long time ago. Three out of four children are dead..."

traits.locale_text: «Vaya asco de vida...». {n}Jae se ríe siniestramente.{/n} «Arrastrados a un planeta en medio de ninguna parte. Abandonados en un yacimiento sin valor del que todo el mundo se olvidó hace la tira de tiempo. Tres de cada cuatro niños, muertos...».

languages.text: "Was für ein Leben ..." {n}Jae lacht grimmig.{/n} "Auf einem Planeten mitten im Nichts ausgesetzt. Zu einer wertlosen Ausgrabungsstätte verfrachtet, die alle anderen vermutlich schon vor langer Zeit vergessen haben. Drei von vier Kindern sind tot ..."
languages.original_text: "What a life..." {n}Jae chuckles grimly.{/n} "Dragged to a planet in the middle of nowhere. Dumped on a worthless excavation site that everyone else probably forgot about a long time ago. Three out of four children are dead..."

traits.locale_text: "Was für ein Leben ..." {n}Jae lacht grimmig.{/n} "Auf einem Planeten mitten im Nichts ausgesetzt. Zu einer wertlosen Ausgrabungsstätte verfrachtet, die alle anderen vermutlich schon vor langer Zeit vergessen haben. Drei von vier Kindern sind tot ..."

languages.text: "Ne hayat ama." {n}Jae tatsız tatsız gülümsüyor.{/n} "Hiçliğin ortasındaki bir gezegene sürüklenmek. Herkesin muhtemelen uzun zaman önce unuttuğu, işe yaramaz bir kazı alanına atılmak. Dört çocuğunun üçünün ölmesi."
languages.original_text: "What a life..." {n}Jae chuckles grimly.{/n} "Dragged to a planet in the middle of nowhere. Dumped on a worthless excavation site that everyone else probably forgot about a long time ago. Three out of four children are dead..."

traits.locale_text: "Ne hayat ama." {n}Jae tatsız tatsız gülümsüyor.{/n} "Hiçliğin ortasındaki bir gezegene sürüklenmek. Herkesin muhtemelen uzun zaman önce unuttuğu, işe yaramaz bir kazı alanına atılmak. Dört çocuğunun üçünün ölmesi."
